author: CA WILDFIRE BOT
title: Breaking: New wildfire reported in Los Angeles County on March 4
text:
Fires
Breaking: New wildfire reported in Los Angeles County on March 4
The creation of this content included the use of AI based on templates created, reviewed and edited by journalists in the newsroom. Read more on our AI policy here.
First discovered: 19 hours ago, 10:01 p.m. March 4
Initial location: Los Angeles County, Calif.
Fire type: Wildfire
Fire name: LAC-081935
A new wildfire was reported 10:01 p.m. March 4 in Los Angeles County.
The wildfire has been burning on private land for 19 hours. At this time, there is no information on the containment of the fire and the cause of it has yet to be determined.
Source: National Interagency Fire Center
This story was originally published March 5, 2025 at 6:13 PM.
